sentences.en: ‘The meal was absolutely delicious,’ she said politely.
sentences.cn: “这顿饭味道好极了。” 她礼貌地说道。

sentences.en: Chick peas have a distinctive, delicious and nutty flavour.
sentences.cn: 鹰嘴豆有独特可口的坚果风味。

sentences.en: Fresh fish makes a delicious meal.
sentences.cn: 新鲜的鱼做菜非常美味。

sentences.en: Glasses of Madeira wine were brought to us. We declared it delicious.
sentences.cn: 端来了几杯马德拉白葡萄酒，我们一致认为它的味道好极了。

sentences.en: Pecan nuts are delicious both raw and cooked.
sentences.cn: 美洲山核桃不论生的还是熟的都很好吃。

sentences.en: the delicious coolness of the water
the delicious smell of new-mown grass
The ham is delicious with avocado.
The pizza tastes delicious without any cheese at all.
sentences.cn: 不加奶酪的比萨饼很好吃。

sentences.en: The smells of delicious foods floated all around him.
sentences.cn: 美食的香味弥漫在他的四周。

sentences.en: There is a delicious irony in all this.
sentences.cn: 这一切中包含了一种绝妙的讽刺。

sentences.en: These cakes are fudgy, gooey, and delicious.
These mushrooms would make a delicious side dish.
sentences.cn: 这些蘑菇将会是一道美味的佐菜。

sentences.en: This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare.
sentences.cn: 这种稍加变化的可口煎蛋卷做起来又快又容易。

sentences.en: Traditional Spanish food is delicious and its specialities are worth searching out.
sentences.cn: 传统的西班牙食品美味可口，其特色菜肴值得寻访。

words.tran_cn: 微妙的；精美的，雅致的；柔和的；易碎的；纤弱的；清淡可口的

trans.tran_cn: 美味的，美妙的，令人愉快的
trans.tran_en: very pleasant to taste or smell
very pleasant to taste or smell
